name: Ritual (itch) (Surfacner)
description:
Ascend to be the creator of your own destiny...

Ritual is a top-down shooter with visual novel and rpg elements. Explore the depths of a fragmented mind and try to fix it by changing the protagonist's past and present back to normal.

  • Experience fast-paced chaotic action;
  • Use an arsenal of weapons to dispatch your enemies;
  • Sharpen your reflexes and get ready to rip and tear!

(this game is still in development and many features are missing)

Changelog:

V 0.1

3 playable levels available + arena;

Blast, Soul Blast, Sniper, Magnum, Railgun and Whipshot have been added;

Controls:

W,A,S,D or Arrow keys to move;

Left Mouse Click or CTRL to shoot;

Enter to select;

Esc to open menu.

Experimental:

Shift to jump (not fully implemented).
